pages.text: Harvest the light. The counterpart to the Ritual of Sol, this ritual collects all light-emitting blocks within its range and stores them in a chest above the ritual stone.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: The ritual can use a chest (or any block with item storage) placed directly above the Master Ritual Stone. Every 5 ticks, the ritual attempts to:$(br)1. Find a light-emitting block (light level > 0)$(br)2. Harvest the block$(br)3. Store it in the chest (or drop at MRS if no chest)$(br)4. Consume LP for the operation

pages.title: Search Algorithm
pages.text: The ritual uses a center-outward search to find light sources:$(br)- Starts at the Master Ritual Stone$(br)- Searches downward only (never above)$(br)- Expands in square rings: 0, 1, 2... blocks away$(br)- Searches each column from top to bottom$(br)- Prioritizes nearby lights before distant ones$(br)- Processes up to 1024 positions per tick$(br)- Resumes where it left off between ticks$(br2)This ensures efficient harvesting starting from the ritual center and working downward.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 1000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 1 LP per block harvested$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 5 ticks$(br2)$(bold)Horizontal Range:$() Configurable (default: 32 blocks)$(br)$(bold)Vertical Range:$() Configurable (default: 64 blocks, -1 for world bottom)$(br)$(bold)Chest:$() 1 block above ritual (optional)$(br2)Harvests any block that emits light. If no chest is present, drops items at the Master Ritual Stone.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Cleaning up light sources$(li)Harvesting glowstone$(li)Collecting torches$(li)Reclaiming blood lights$(li)Paired automation with Ritual of Sol$(br2)$(italic)The eternal cycle of light and darkness.$()
